extendedInfo.description: With the Dropcam Android app, you can:- Get alerts on your phone when motion or audio is detected- Talk Back with your kids once they're home from school- Watch high quality video over 3G, 4G, and Wi-FiDon't own a Dropcam? No problem! Visit https://www.dropcam.com to learn more.Redesigned from the ground up, the Dropcam Android app now works with many different Android phones (old and new) and plays video more smoothly. With new camera controls for night vision, zooming, and Talk Back, you'll easily be able to watch what you love while away from anywhere. No need to own a camera, download the app for FREE now!Use Dropcam as a home security camera to always know what's happening when you're not home. Live your busy life with peace of mind, knowing that Dropcam is watching and will alert you when it detects an event. We've been featured by ABC, NBC, USA Today, Fox News, and recognized as the easiest and most powerful network camera to use.Download the Dropcam Android app today and see for yourself!Pair the app with a Dropcam and:â Receive motion alerts on-the-goâ See past events with Dropcam's Cloud Video Recording (CVR) serviceâ Control your Dropcam from anywhereLearn more about how Dropcam will be the last baby monitor, home security camera, or pet camera you'll ever need at https://www.dropcam.comIt's more than just an easy, plug n play IP camera, Dropcam lets you stay in touch with what you love.**A special thank you to all of our Android Beta testers for helping us make an amazing Android app. This app wouldn't be anywhere near as great without all your help!**

reviews.title: Works Perfect
reviews.comment: Works for me.  Easy install and registration.  App loaded on my EVO 3D and Kindle Fire (first gen) with Uverse ATT wifi.  Best bang for the buck to home monitor.
reviews.author: William Chesser

reviews.title: Annoying bugs
reviews.comment: The software is great but there are two annoying bugs. When I go to a cameras events sometimes the audio of the camera will start playing. I have to go back to the live video and then again to events to fix stop the audio playback. The other bug is when in scrolling through events it suddenly kicks me out back to the video like I lose the authenticated session and the only way to fix this is to go all the way back to the camera list. I always lose my place in the events list :(
reviews.author: Robert Pooley

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Wish the zoom could be toggled by pinch gesture instead of going into the settings menu.  Also full duplex talk would be awesome.  Thanks for such a great product!
reviews.author: Kam Desai

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: The idea of this app is great. Too bad it barely works. It\'s always freezing, or attempting to load. It just keeps getting worse.
reviews.author: Amanda Sweeney

reviews.title: Works OK
reviews.comment: Generally,  this app works fine but I have noticed that not all motion that is in the viewing range of the camera is notified via text.   I have found several instances in which my account on their site was picking up motion but the app was not notifying me through a text.   Fix that and this app is 5 stars easy.
reviews.author: Andrew Black

reviews.title: Easy setup
reviews.comment: I just wish I could tell which family member is watching me.  Have it setup using 3 phones, 1 tablet, 1 laptop and 2 home pc\'s.
reviews.author: John Schmidt

reviews.title: Latest update problems for Droid 4/Jelly Bean
reviews.comment: When I receive an alert, the link takes me to the camera list. When I go to \"settings\" and try to turn off \"alerts\", I sometimes receive alerts anyway at random. When I recheck \"alerts\" on the app, it creates an a duplicate link for my device on the web settings. Also, I sometimes receive \"sound\" alerts now even though that is unchecked on the web. Please fix for 5 stars - I own 3 Dropcams!
reviews.author: Tim Arnold

reviews.title: Data Overage
reviews.comment: There have been a few occasions that I\'ve forgotten to turn off the Dropcam viewer on my Android. I walked out of the house (away from our wireless connection) and went over my data plan in a few minutes. There needs to be an option to allow \"viewing under Wi-Fi only.\" Aside from that, I love the Dropcam.
reviews.author: Kathleen Cuellar

reviews.title: Must have!
reviews.comment: I don\'t write reviews but this is dumb proof! Quality with both the video and audio. Beats the value over those high priced systems at the big box warehouse stores! Get the DVR if you want a recording system to save for law enforcement. It\'s worth the peace of mind.
reviews.author: Chuck Schifferling

reviews.comment: I tried 3 WiFi cams before I came across Dropcam. This is by far the best on the market. There\'s about a 3 sec delay but besides that its a great quality picture, talking capability and easy installation! My mom loves talking to my son on the camera every morning! Excellent!!
reviews.author: Debra Kolasienski

reviews.title: Camera is good. The app needs some work.
reviews.comment: Latest update has issue for me. When I open an even from the notification bar, it brings me to the cameras list instead of to the video of the even. So when I click my camera in the camera list it just goes to live view instead of the event.  Needs to be an on/off switch on the camera list screen instead of the extra steps it takes to turn on a camera.
reviews.author: Beatle Chambers

reviews.title: Great product but needs 1. Better zoom, 2. Multi window support
reviews.comment: Great product but needs 1. Better zoom, 2. Multi window support
reviews.author: Matthew Barrett

reviews.title: Perfect Now
reviews.comment: Dropcam used to crash and be unstable. With latest upgrade, it works flawlessly. 5 stars
reviews.author: Jason Willis

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love the dropcam, the app works smoothly and the camera quality is very good.
reviews.author: Edward Martinez

reviews.title: Good for basic live viewing
reviews.comment: Interacting with motion events and recorded history could be better.  Needs a way to fast forward through recordings.  There is no way to share a link to your cam from within the app or to manage shared links.
reviews.author: Roland McIntosh

reviews.title: Thanks Dropcam.
reviews.comment: Finally able to receive my alerts. Quality of video is also better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Latest update
reviews.comment: Since update the playback is delayed and skips alot did not happen in previous version
reviews.author: chris blanchard

reviews.title: Limited Timezones
reviews.comment: Great app except for the fact that you only have the choice of US time zones. I\'m based in Cape Town which is problematic.
reviews.author: Nic Retief

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Motion alerts works 1 out of 10. Android users are neglected and iphone users get the better app with location sensors.
reviews.author: Nghiem Pham

reviews.title: App not working
reviews.comment: Galaxy s3 - Whenever I click on the live feed it, the app freezes.   Never had this issue until today.   Uninstalled/reinstalled no help.   Please fix asap.
reviews.author: CLINT HORMANN
